name: Dunk Plank
description:
This is a truly educational video game. Because this is itch.io and half the stuff labeled educational isn't strictly that (even Dunk Tank, and I made that) I can't stress enough how much this is truly, unironically, an educational video game with no horror or trolling elements.

It's basically Dunk Tank minus the "reflex" tasks plus a bit of pirate theming.

Dedicated to my godson.
